entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon except gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 14 April 2023
